TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

btw, major, you know how to post imgur pics to this forum? Might help you out in the future updating posts of your progress! And, triston, what he put down WAS on topic!.

And I've already made many improvements to it!
OOHHH! And I thought we had it bad over here in California! We got wildfires on the loose! We (or I) will be praying for your safety!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T23:59:19Z" title="08/28/2015 11:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by Tristonwilson12**

> 
> theres nothing funny about Katrina.... I had a family friend who passed away during Katrina...

 I didn't say that Katrina was funny, and we need to get back on topic.

> 
> theres nothing funny about Katrina.... I had a family friend who passed away during Katrina...

I think he meant the coincidence, rather than it actually being haha funny. Oh, and in terms of the coincidence, it isn't really one, as there is a general "hurricane season", which happens every year, the biggest one recently being superstorm sandy, which was quite a nuisance where I live.
I think this thread is inching perilously close to political. So lets get back on the topic of awesome launchpads.

> 
> I think this thread is inching perilously close to political. So lets get back on the topic of awesome launchpads.

Indeed!

So I made a primitive Cosmodrome with KSCSwitcher at about the same spot as we're gonna be putting it, I really think that we should use KSCSwitcher.

> 
> Indeed!
> So I made a primitive Cosmodrome with KSCSwitcher at about the same spot as we're gonna be putting it, I really think that we should use KSCSwitcher.

I'm not making any promises but I will look into it
For the next update will there be a KerbalStuff download? I think that would be a pretty helpful idea, and where's liquidhype? Haven't seen him today

> 
> For the next update will there be a KerbalStuff download? I think that would be a pretty helpful idea, and where's liquidhype? Haven't seen him today

I'm here. Why exactly do we need a download? Unless we all of a sudden have 15-20 laundpads/sites ready, there is no download going up for this mod.

> 
> I'm here. Why exactly do we need a download? Unless we all of a sudden have 15-20 laundpads/sites ready, there is no download going up for this mod.

Uhh, how about once we have the whole KSC done (Not including Nova and advanced Saturn V pads or Redstone pads)...

> 
> Uhh, how about once we have the whole KSC done (Not including Nova and advanced Saturn V pads or Redstone pads)...

You will see the download link on the first page of the OP once there is a download avaiable, and not a second before. There is absolutely no point in having people download something that is not even 25% done.
Oh okay I got it now. Although we have lots of projects underway right now.
